nodes.name: WorkAttempt
nodes.description: Any task or project that aims to meet a singular objective, such as collecting files from a repository.

properties.name: OpenClosed
properties.description: Represents the type of study being conducted within a WorkAttempt.

properties.name: req_code
properties.description: A specific piece of work undertaken to meet a single requirement, often defined by the WorkAttempt's purpose.

properties.name: plannedRelease
properties.description: Specifies the desired completion date for a particular piece of work.

properties.name: funding_institution
properties.description: Identifies the organizations that provide funding for a WorkAttempt or researcher.

properties.name: CollaboratorID
properties.description: Identifies the individual responsible for meeting a specific WorkAttempt requirement.

properties.name: last_submitted_work
properties.description: Track the latest piece of work completed or attempted within a specific WorkAttempt.

properties.name: ReleaseableFlag
properties.description: This field determines if a WorkAttempt can be released, controlled by the user.

properties.name: task_requirement_project
properties.description: The URL of the dataset's source.

properties.name: jcoin_study_id
properties.description: Unique key for a single requirement that represents a self-contained unit of work.

nodes.name: SiteAddress
nodes.description: Describes the regional position of a project, including latitude and longitude values.

properties.name: ProjectLoc
properties.description: A reference to the city where a project takes place.

properties.name: CovidUID
properties.description: The unique identifier for a project's location, based on predefined criteria.

properties.name: Earthland
properties.description: The largest areas of land on Earth.

properties.name: region_name
properties.description: A standard ISO code for the country or region.

properties.name: RegionalUnit
properties.description: County

properties.name: iso2
properties.description: A concise two-letter code representing a specific nation.

properties.name: iso_3166_2
properties.description: Two-letter country code plus separator and optional three-character identifier for provinces or states.

properties.name: geo_point
properties.description: Coordinate pair representing a project.

properties.name: geoLong
properties.description: Geographical information contained in the table with the ability to store longitudes or other similar values. This is suitable for all databases that use the 'longitude' named SiteAddress table as this would be consistent across all tables using this term.

properties.name: metro_area
properties.description: A compact geographic area encompassing a major city and its surrounding metropolitan regions.

properties.name: site_identity
properties.description: A standardized term for geographical locations in the database.

properties.name: operOrg
properties.description: The operational status of a project location as recorded in the summary table.

properties.name: LocationRegion
properties.description: Identifies the region within a project's location that is relevant to its healthcare aspects.

properties.name: jcoin_study_id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'WorkAttempt' table that relate via this foreign key to records in the 'summary_location' table.

properties.name: location_key
properties.description: The unique identifier for each project location, used to identify and track locations across multiple projects.

nodes.name: exploratory_design
nodes.description: A systematic plan for gathering data through observations and actions.

properties.name: authors
properties.description: Collection of experts contributing to the research.

properties.name: researchBrief
properties.description: A detailed description of the data files and metadata, providing additional context and insights.

properties.name: DataGatheringStatus
properties.description: Informs the analysis team regarding the action taken or taken not been done in the exploratory_design.

properties.name: ResearchPublication
properties.description: A description of the exploratory_design's findings and conclusions.

properties.name: PublicationsList
properties.description: The article's publication outlet.

properties.name: study_identifier
properties.description: Pubmed identifier for the article

properties.name: discoveryOutline
properties.description: A brief summary of a exploratory_design, focusing on its main components, methodology, and results.

properties.name: id_system
properties.description: The DOI serves as a persistent link to a exploratory_design's digital content, facilitating efficient searching and retrieval.

properties.name: StudyReleased
properties.description: The date of publication for the coordinated set of actions and observations.

properties.name: VersionShared
properties.description: The most recent data shared from a exploratory_design, often used for updating research.

properties.name: jcoin_study_id
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'WorkAttempt' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'study' table.

properties.name: record_index
properties.description: A unique identifier used to track exploratory_design records and data.

nodes.name: patient_case
nodes.description: Patient and case-related data gathered for a specific experiment or study.

properties.name: covid_19_status
properties.description: The amount and type of virus present within a patient_case's system, often used to monitor treatment effectiveness.

properties.name: PatientTransmitter
properties.description: Indicates the patient_case who is carrying or transmitting the infection.

properties.name: dataDescription
properties.description: Patient information, demographics, and data related to their cases.

properties.name: zipResidentialPrefix
properties.description: The part of the patient's or patient_case's zip code that relates to their demographic information.

properties.name: ClassificationKey
properties.description: Designates the specific taxonomic classification of an organism.

properties.name: dataset_subject_info
properties.description: Information about patient_cases as part of a broader research project.

properties.name: SubjectUID
properties.description: Unique identifier assigned to patient_cases in various studies and experiments.

properties.name: subject_data
properties.description: A comprehensive set of data related to a particular patient_case or research topic.

properties.name: ProjectResult
properties.description: The survival state of the person registered on the protocol.

properties.name: record_index
properties.description: Dataset identifiers used for patient, case, or subject record linkage.

properties.name: jcoin_study_id
properties.description: Combination of WorkAttempt and subject IDs for efficient lookup.

properties.name: data_record
properties.description: The unique identifier assigned to each patient, case, or patient_case in a dataset or experimental context.

nodes.name: diseasePresenceIndicators
nodes.description: Concise results of an investigation into a subject's signs, symptoms, and scientific determination.

properties.name: RDStatus
properties.description: Is the patient experiencing symptoms of acute respiratory distress?

properties.name: CdcId2019v2
properties.description: Code used to identify and track COVID-19 data.

properties.name: us_source_case
properties.description: COVID-19 Source Case - U.S.

properties.name: BronchialCld
properties.description: Clinical facts and diseasePresenceIndicatorss related to chronic lung diseases.

properties.name: HepaticCoexistence
properties.description: Association between hepatic disease and comorbid conditions in patients.

properties.name: ClinicalFacts
properties.description: A state of being that describes the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury.

properties.name: usCovidCheck
properties.description: Did the patient have direct contact with someone infected in the US?

properties.name: Observations
properties.description: Information gathered on the subject's medical history and conditions.

properties.name: hospitalized_status
properties.description: Was the patient hospitalized due to illness or injury?

properties.name: ICUAdmitted
properties.description: Does the diseasePresenceIndicators data indicate a critical condition that requires intensive care?

properties.name: isolation_status
properties.description: Detailed results of clinical diseasePresenceIndicatorss.

properties.name: othrp_obs_data
properties.description: Observations that don't fit into standard measurement domains like social and lifestyle information

properties.name: fact_observation
properties.description: Clinical facts not captured by measurements.

properties.name: PnomaPresentFlag
properties.description: Did pneumonia result from the lymphatic system of the patient?

properties.name: dateFirstPosTestU
properties.description: Used to verify if the date of the initial confirmed case is not recorded.

properties.name: outcomeDate
properties.description: The point in time when a program or intervention ends.

properties.name: ClinicalFindings
properties.description: Reporting date

properties.name: Tobacco user
properties.description: Indicates an individual's status as a tobacco user or non-user.

properties.name: data_record
properties.description: Foreign key referencing unique patient_case IDs in related observation records.

properties.name: StudyUnique
properties.description: A unique identifier for records in this 'diseasePresenceIndicators' table.

nodes.name: SymptomReportEntry
nodes.description: A log of all clinical encounters, including dates, times, and nature of visits.

properties.name: PatientMeetingCode
properties.description: Guid used in observation nodes to uniquely identify SymptomReportEntrys.

properties.name: EncounterEnd
properties.description: A standard, abbreviated representation of a patient's SymptomReportEntry end date.

properties.name: cpt_list
properties.description: CPT codes used during clinical SymptomReportEntrys.

properties.name: PatientStartDate
properties.description: A field capturing the starting point of an SymptomReportEntry, providing context for subsequent data entries.

properties.name: StudyUnique
properties.description: Matches records in the 'encounter' table with corresponding records elsewhere in the database.

properties.name: EncounterNum
properties.description: A one-of-a-kind code assigned to each patient SymptomReportEntry, enabling efficient tracking of medical history and treatment plans.

nodes.name: sample
nodes.description: Used for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including samples obtained from living organisms, halting of all life functions.

properties.name: CellGrowthEquipment
properties.description: Equipment used to culture and store biological materials, such as cells and tissues.

properties.name: PureCellSample
properties.description: A material sample that has been optimized for consistency and quality in testing or research applications.

properties.name: CellCount
properties.description: A numerical representation of the density of cultured cells in one container.

properties.name: specimenSample
properties.description: This field contains a description of the sample. The information provided here can include details about the sample's composition and origin.

properties.name: ContinentOfOrigin
properties.description: A material sample obtained from a biological entity for various purposes.

properties.name: SamplingUnit
properties.description: A sample taken from a living organism or biological object for research purposes.

properties.name: eastWestGeoLocation
properties.description: Geographic coordinates representing the county side of the sample's location.

properties.name: ResearchMaterial
properties.description: The taxonomic level Family.

properties.name: genetic_sample
properties.description: Genetic Sample ID. Description of sample.

properties.name: OrganicAge
properties.description: The age of the sample, considering its origin and composition.

properties.name: BiospecimenTravelHistory
properties.description: Countries visited by the host during disease exposure.

properties.name: sample_characterization
properties.description: Refers to the part of the original specimen taken for testing or research purposes.

properties.name: specimen_origin
properties.description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.

properties.name: sampleTypeDesc
properties.description: Characterizes the current stored material type of the sample at LDACC.

properties.name: data_record
properties.description: Identifies any material sample used for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment, or research purposes.

properties.name: StudyUnique
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'diseasePresenceIndicators' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: record_index
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'exploratory_design' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'sample' table.

properties.name: jcoin_study_id
properties.description: Any material sample taken for diagnostic, propagation, treatment, or research purposes.

properties.name: EncounterNum
properties.description: Unique reference for a biospecimen used in testing, diagnostics, or research.

properties.name: specimenPart
properties.description: A unique identifier for each biological or material sample in the database.

nodes.name: virus_genome
nodes.description: Central repository for nucleotide sequencing data.

properties.name: accession
properties.description: SRA Run accession in the form of SRR######## (ERR or DRR for INSDC partners).

properties.name: genomicFileHub
properties.description: The source of the virus genome.

properties.name: sourceLocations
properties.description: Points of access for downloading virus genomic data files.

properties.name: GenomeDataStart
properties.description: The data file containing the virus genomic files was first published.

properties.name: InsDcVirusAlias
properties.description: Alias of the INSDC partner used in the virus genome data.

properties.name: genome_data_file
properties.description: A collection of databases for storing viral sequence information.

properties.name: mbases
properties.description: The number of mega bases in the SRA runs.

properties.name: platform
properties.description: A collection of genomic files from viral genomes sequenced using Illumina platforms.

properties.name: ViralGenomicsData
properties.description: A collection of virus files, including their genomic contents and characteristics, used for further research and analysis.

properties.name: specimenPart
properties.description: Foreign key field referencing virus genomic data.

properties.name: record_index
properties.description: A unique identifier for virus genomic records in the 'virus_genome' table.

properties.name: VirusId
properties.description: A unique identifier for every record in the virus_genome table, making it simple to track and manage vast amounts of genomic data.

nodes.name: SequenceDatabaseEntry
nodes.description: Provides details on the viral genome, including its size, composition, and characteristics.

properties.name: SeqDatabaseCen
properties.description: Virus sequencing research facility

properties.name: PublicUseOnly
properties.description: Description of access level for virus sequence data.

properties.name: file_content_type
properties.description: Data type information for files of viral sequence data.

properties.name: datastore_provider
properties.description: Stores information about the websites or servers hosting sequence files related to viruses.

properties.name: data_source_id
properties.description: Source identifier for the sample sequence data.

properties.name: insdc_seq_rel_date
properties.description: The launch date of the database table containing virus sequence files, marked as publicly accessible.

properties.name: GenomeData
properties.description: Files containing viral sequence information.

properties.name: library_source
properties.description: Describes the library type used to generate the virus sequence files.

properties.name: RandomViralSeq
properties.description: Describes the type of PCR used for amplifying selected viral sequences.

properties.name: sequenceFileSource
properties.description: This variable specifies the origin of the sequence data stored in the 'SequenceDatabaseEntry' table.

properties.name: SRARunData
properties.description: Number of mega bytes of data in the SRA Run.

properties.name: digitalFingerPrint
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: GlobalPangolin
properties.description: Comparative analysis of pangolin lineage phylogenetic relationships in viral data sets.

properties.name: sequencing_eqt
properties.description: Sequencing equipment or tool used in the lab.

properties.name: InfectorDate
properties.description: The day when the biological threat posed by the virus sequence data became apparent to the general public.

properties.name: specimenPart
properties.description: Sequence ID to Sample ID mapping, used to link viral sequences with their corresponding records in the 'sample' table.

properties.name: VirusId
properties.description: References between virus genomes and their respective sequence data.

properties.name: record_index
properties.description: Unique identifiers for records in the 'sequence' table that relate via this foreign key to records in this 'exploratory_design' table.

properties.name: location_key
properties.description: Foreign key referencing the 'virus_sequence' table, establishing a link with 'SiteAddress' records.

properties.name: SeqFileNum
properties.description: A sequential number assigned to virus sequence files in the 'SequenceDatabaseEntry' table.

properties.name: accession_number
properties.description: Shortened version of the full taxonomy ID.

properties.name: RunAnalysis
properties.description: Format for storing sequence data in the database.

properties.name: SeqFileNum
properties.description: Provides a bridge between virus sequence and taxonomy data, enabling analysis and comparison of related records.

properties.name: kmer_result_id
properties.description: Identifying code for records in the virus sequence run taxonomy table that represent the outcome of kmer-based taxonomic analysis on raw sequencing runs.

nodes.name: RefSeq_guided_sars
nodes.description: Detailed assembly data for SARS-CoV-2 refseq guided assemblies. Includes contig information.

properties.name: dataFileSize
properties.description: Represents the size of a specific reference sequence assembly in binary units.

properties.name: RefseqCheck
properties.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number used as a file's digital fingerprint.

properties.name: kmer_result_id
properties.description: Identifiers for virus sequence run taxonomies related to SARS-CoV-2 refseq guided assemblies.

properties.name: ViralSequenceTag
properties.description: Key for identifying viral sequences in the contig table, linked to SARS-CoV-2 reference sequence assemblies and assembly data.

nodes.name: RapidDataRetrieval
nodes.description: SARS-CoV-2 Read Align Objects have been created to facilitate more rapid identification of NGS data of interest to the COVID-19 research community. This data type represents a compressed data format for more rapid data retrieval and faciliates data exploration via the pre-assembled contigs.

properties.name: FileBytes
properties.description: Real-time alignment measurement in bytes to track progress.

properties.name: ViralSequenceTag
properties.description: Unique identifiers for SARS-CoV-2 Read Align Objects.

properties.name: DataPointKey
properties.description: Coronavirus-specific reference ID for tracking and managing read align objects.
